dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems in a logical and methodical manner, breaking them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to navigate complex issues, often finding innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take initiative to seek out and learn from various sources, including books and online resources.
Your FarTwin will prefer a more formalized approach to learning, such as through courses or guided workshops.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be comfortable using and exploring new technologies, often embracing their potential benefits.
Your FarTwin will approach technology with a mix of curiosity and skepticism, weighing the pros and cons before adopting new tools or systems.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin consider global implications?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take a broad, integrated approach to understanding global issues, considering the interconnectedness of different cultures and economies.
Your FarTwin will evaluate global issues within specific contexts or regions, recognizing the unique challenges and opportunities present in each area.

dimensions.label: Career Aspirations
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their professional life?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for success and recognition in their chosen field, often taking calculated risks to achieve their goals.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and collaboration, recognizing the value of diverse perspectives and expertise in achieving shared objectives.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, actively seeking opportunities to connect with people from different backgrounds and interests.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social interactions, often recharging their energy by spending time alone or engaging in solo activities.

dimensions.label: Innovation Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creativity and innovation?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be naturally curious, often venturing into uncharted territories to discover new ideas and solutions.
Your FarTwin will focus on refining and iterating existing concepts, working to perfect and optimize their creations rather than introducing entirely new ideas.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize brevity and clarity, using straightforward language to convey their thoughts and ideas.
Your FarTwin will be more emotive and expressive in their communication, often relying on tone of voice, body language, and storytelling techniques to convey meaning.
